performance_issues.issue: Model loaded on first use only - no preload mechanism
performance_issues.recommendation: Consider preloading model on page hover or idle

performance_issues.issue: Model loaded on first use only - no preload mechanism
performance_issues.recommendation: Consider preloading model on page hover or idle

performance_issues.issue: 350MB model - largest among tools, loaded lazily
performance_issues.recommendation: Add prominent progress indicator, consider smaller model variant

performance_issues.issue: 300MB model - large bundle, loaded on demand
performance_issues.recommendation: Consider smaller distilbart variant or preload on hover

performance_issues.issue: Multiple model packages loaded dynamically per quality selection
performance_issues.recommendation: Cache selected model quality in localStorage

performance_issues.issue: SAM model with WebGPU/WASM fallback - no explicit worker thread
performance_issues.recommendation: Consider Web Worker for mask generation to avoid UI blocking

performance_issues.issue: Model loaded but no useRef caching between sessions
No shared model cache across different tool pages
performance_issues.recommendation: Implement cross-tool model registry for shared models (e.g., whisper-tiny used in 2 tools)

caching_strategy.details: @huggingface/transformers uses IndexedDB for model caching automatically
caching_strategy.validation: progress_callback shows 'downloading' status on first load only

anti_patterns: No explicit error handling for model load failures
No retry mechanism for interrupted downloads
No progress persistence for large model downloads
No model version pinning - uses latest from Xenova
